channel.title: Help with weapon hitting
channel.description: the karils crossbow on my server hits like 50 +, how can i make it hit lower like 20s maybe?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 20, 2007, 07:35:36 PM[/size][hr]can someone help me with this please, this is all i need.

item.title: Help with weapon hitting
item.dc:creator: @i_loot_i i loot i
item.description:
@i_loot_i wrote:

just change your calculate range void …

search this void =

	public void CalculateRange

and replace that void with mine :

public void CalculateRange() { double MaxHit = 0; int RangeBonus = playerBonus[4]; //Range Bonus int Range = playerLevel[4]; //Range { MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(RangeBonus * Range) * 0.00070)); } MaxHit += (double)(Range * 0.060); playerMaxHit = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit); }

if this didn’t helped then try to change your calculatemaxhit void

search :

	public void CalculateMaxHit() {

and replace it with this

public void CalculateMaxHit() { double MaxHit = 0; int StrBonus = playerBonus[10]; //Strength Bonus int Strength = playerLevel[playerStrength]; //Strength int RngBonus = playerBonus[4]; // Ranged Bonus int Range = playerLevel[4];//Ranged //melee if (FightType == 1 || FightType == 4) { //Accurate & Defensive MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00070)); } else if (FightType == 2) { //Aggresive MaxHit += (double)(1.15 + (double)((double)(StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00070)); } else if (FightType == 3) { //Controlled MaxHit += (double)(1.15 + (double)((double)(StrBonus) * 0.00070)); } //pots and prayer MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.1); if (StrPotion == 1) { //Strength Potion MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.000915); } else if (StrPotion == 2) { //Super Strength Potion MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.0099); } if (StrPrayer == 1) { //Burst Of Strength MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.00238); } else if (StrPrayer == 2) { //Super Human Strength MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.0048); } else if (StrPrayer == 3) { //Ultimate Strength MaxHit += (double)(Strength * 0.00968); } //range if (FightType == 5 || FightType == 6) { //Accurate and Longranged MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(RngBonus * Range) * 0.00070)); } else if (FightType == 7) { //Rapid MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(RngBonus * Range) * 0.00070)); } MaxHit += (double)(Range * 0.060); //dharok if(FullDharokEquipped()) { MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00080)); } playerMaxHit = (int)Math.floor(MaxHit); }

and if this didn’t helped ??? then just change your range bonusses cause u gave to much bonus then …

  • I loot I -

Read full topic
